name: Web Development
details: This is a course that will guide students to be a Web Developer in 6 month. After that the students can have the quality to become a Junior Web Developer.

name: JavaScript All You Need To Know
details: This is a JS Course that will cover JS from beginning to Expert level. It will take 3 months to complete the course.

name: Algorithms and Data Structures
details: This course is about Algorithm and Data Structure. The duration of this course is 4 months. The instructor will teach about various algorithm and data structure model in this time period.

name: Machine Learning Courses
details: This course is about machine learning. During the 6 month period of this course the students will complete 2 real time project to boost their knowledge in Machine Learning.

name: MERN Stack Development
details: This is a part of a Full Stack Software Development. This course will take 8 month to be finished and cove 4 real time project in this duration. This course will follow MERN development process.

name: Software Development Life Cycle
details: This course is about the SDLC. A lots of students do not completely understands the software Development Life Cycle which prevents them from becoming a Good Developer. This course will take 3 months and will teach complete SDLC.

name: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
details: This course is about Artificial Intelligence (AI). The students will learn about the AI in this 5 months.
